name: SICKLE CELL DISEASE PARTNERSHIP
description: Alliance of patient advocates, plans, providers & manufacturers focused on federal policy.
sampleDescriptions: Advocating for federal health care policies based on the National Academies 2020 report that will improve the lives of patients living with Sickle Cell Disease.
